info.title: geek_script
info.description:
An API for a basic ecommerce themed around nerdy products. The final project of [Gama Academy](https://gama.academy/) webdevelopment course. Current version is still in development.

Useful links:
  - [Backend project repository](https://github.com/tiagospeckart/geekstore-backend)
  - [Frontend project repository](https://github.com/GabrielGameDev/geek-script-front)
